hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json|css)$'; then pnpm exec prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then cd apps/server && pnpm exec eslint "$file_path" --fix 2>/dev/null || true; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then cd apps/server && pnpm type-check 2>/dev/null & fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE 'test\.ts$'; then cd apps/server && pnpm test 2>/dev/null & fi; }
